snippet.title: Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises | Early Access | Gameplay Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises is a medieval real time strategy game set in the land of Spero, which has multiplayer combat and will feature a single-player campaign. In the single-player campaign, players start as a commander within the city of Avon, one of Spero’s five city states. Avon is under attack from the treacherous Speran Alliance and players aid King Lutherian in defending their homeland and fighting to conquer the warring factions. The ultimate goal is to unite all five factions under the banner of the Order of Dawn.
 
Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises supports up to six players in all out Team Deathmatch and Free-For-All battles. Players build cities and armies in Conflict Mode for an expansive military campaign of conquest.  In Battle Mode, competitors can jump straight into the action as they skirmish with friends, taking their armies into the fight for world domination. In Empire Mode, players can join one of the five factions and battle for domination of a persistent multiplayer map.

Get Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises on Steam at http://store.steampowered.com/app/329280/

Check out http://avalonlords.com

Twitch
http://www.twitch.tv/animusinteractive

Twitter
http://www.twitter.com/AvalonLords
http://www.twitter.com/AnimusInt 

Facebook
https://facebook.com/AvalonLordsDawnRises
https://www.facebook.com/AnimusInteractive
